places.name: Aburi Botanical Gardens
places.description: A historic botanical garden established in 1890, known for its lush greenery, rare plant species, and peaceful walking paths.

places.name: Accra Art Centre
places.description: A vibrant cultural market offering traditional crafts, textiles, artwork, and performances representing Ghanaian heritage.

places.name: Accra Mall
places.address: Tetteh Quarshie Interchange, Spintex Road, Accra, Ghana
places.description: One of Ghana’s premier shopping centers, featuring retail stores, restaurants, a cinema, and modern amenities.

places.name: Accra Zoo
places.description: A wildlife sanctuary in the Achimota Forest, housing native species and promoting conservation education.

places.name: Kwame Nkrumah Park
places.address: High Street, Accra Central, Accra, Ghana
places.description: A memorial park dedicated to Ghana’s first president, featuring his mausoleum, museum, and historical artifacts.

places.name: Labadi Beach
places.address: La, Accra, Greater Accra Region, Ghana
places.description: One of Accra’s most popular beaches, known for its lively atmosphere, horse riding, and live music events.

places.name: Makola Market
places.address: Kojo Thompson Road, Accra Central, Accra, Ghana
places.description: A bustling open-air market and commercial hub in Accra, famous for textiles, food items, and household goods.

places.name: Osu Castle
places.description: A 17th-century fort and former seat of government, rich in colonial history and architectural significance.
